duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for supporting all day-to-day facets of highly complex and integrated digital product delivery including creative, business, and technical requirements, product scoping, quality assurance and compliance with established standards, and post-release support.

Working closely with the Customer Care Center, Data Privacy, Security, internal and external business partners, and other Digital Platform product teams to deliver an exceptional customer experience, aligned with business goals and objectives.
Close coordination with core Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and a passion for the customer with a strong technical understanding in a fast-paced environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
